content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Espanyol 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Espanyol 1.
Foul by Sergio García (Espanyol).
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta tries a through ball, but Dani Alves is caught offside.
Substitution, Espanyol. Abraham González replaces Eric Bailly.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jeremy Mathieu replaces Sergio Busquets.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Espanyol 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Pedro.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Salva Sevilla (Espanyol).
Anaitz Arbilla (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Espanyol 1. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Attempt missed. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Espanyol. Cristhian Stuani replaces Felipe Caicedo.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces Luis Suárez.
Álvaro González (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Lucas Vázquez (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Neymar (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Lucas Vázquez (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Salva Sevilla (Espanyol).
Substitution, Espanyol. Héctor Moreno replaces José Cañas.
Offside, Barcelona. Sergio Busquets tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Eric Bailly.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Dani Alves.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Espanyol 1. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Fuentes.
Lucas Vázquez (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Lucas Vázquez (Espanyol).
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Espanyol 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Álvaro González (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Foul by Salva Sevilla (Espanyol).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Espanyol 1.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Espanyol 1.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Espanyol 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Xavi.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).

Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Xavi.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Xavi.
Attempt saved. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Fuentes.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Salva Sevilla (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.
